Description: The city of Moncton is hoping to slow speeding cyclists along the Riverfront Trail with a new sign The school zone style sign flashes how fast a cyclist is going, if they exceed the 15 km h speed limit
Title: Speeding cyclists warned to slow down on Moncton trail
Author: Kate Letterick

Description: Members of a synagogue in Moncton are worried after a member of the congregation experienced verbal attacks at two separate stores
Title: Strangers verbally attack Jewish man in Moncton over Gaza conflict
Author: Elizabeth Fraser

Description: A 22 year old woman was taken to hospital with life threatening injuries after being struck Wednesday in Moncton by a car whose driver then left the scene
Title: 22 year old woman suffers life threatening injuries in Moncton hit and run
Author: CBC News

Description: The latest news on COVID 19 developments in Canada (all times Eastern) 12 30 p m Nunavut is reporting no new cases of COVID 19 There have been no new cases in the territory of about 40,000 people for over a week Bars and restaurants in Iqaluit, where an o
Title: The latest news on COVID 19 developments in Canada on Wednesday, June 30, 2021
Author: The Canadian Press

Description: The City of Moncton is trying new methods to discourage geese from nesting near two popular walking trails after complaints about droppings last summer
Title: City of Moncton getting mixed results with efforts to persuade geese to nest elsewhere
Author: Kate Letterick
